member.name: T:ifc.ifc_bh
member.summary: Provide access to IFC-BH02

member.name: F:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_encon
member.summary: To enable stand alone encoding process for Encoder 1.

member.name: F:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_encon
member.summary: To enable stand alone encoding process for Encoder 2.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Byte)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_bh class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-BH02.
member.param: ifc.ifc_ci in use.
Address for IFC-BH02, in range of 0 to 63. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_bh class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-BH02.
member.param: ifc.ifc_ci in use.
Address for IFC-BH02, in range of 0 to 63. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_stop
member.summary: To stop Motor 1.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_brake
member.summary: To brake Motor 1.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_cw
member.summary: To change the Motor 1 direction to clockwise.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_ccw
member.summary: To change the Motor 1 direction to counter-clockwise.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_speed(System.Byte)
member.summary: To change the speed of Motor 1.
member.param: Speed value of Motor 1 in range of 0 to 255. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_speed(System.Int32)
member.summary: To change the speed of Motor 1.
member.param: Speed value of Motor 1 in range of 0 to 255. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_enclr
member.summary: To clear Encoder 1 value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_stop
member.summary: To stop Motor 2.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_brake
member.summary: To brake Motor 2.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_cw
member.summary: To change the Motor 2 direction to clockwise.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_ccw
member.summary: To change the Motor 2 direction to counter-clockwise.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_speed(System.Byte)
member.summary: To change the speed of Motor 2.
member.param: Speed value of Motor 2 in range of 0 to 255. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_speed(System.Int32)
member.summary: To change the speed of Motor 2.
member.param: Speed value of Motor 2 in range of 0 to 255. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_enclr
member.summary: To clear Encoder 2 value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_enval
member.summary: To read Encoder 1 value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_runstat
member.summary: To read Motor 1 run status.
member.returns: Return false if Motor 1 is stopped or braked. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_enstat
member.summary: To read Encoder 1 stand alone encoding status.
member.returns: Return true if Encoder 1 is in progress. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_1_spval
member.summary: To read Motor 1 speed value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_enval
member.summary: To read Encoder 2 value.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_runstat
member.summary: To read Motor 2 run status.
member.returns: Return false if Motor 2 is stopped or braked. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_enstat
member.summary: To read Encoder 2 stand alone encoding status.
member.returns: Return true if Encoder 2 is in progress. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh.bh_2_spval
member.summary: To read Motor 2 speed value.

member.summary: For IFC system internal use.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_bh._bh_1_encon.none(System.Int32)
member.summary: No action after targeted encoder value is reached.
member.param: Targeted encoder value in range of 0 to 65535. (int)

member.summary: Motor 1 change direction to clockwise after targeted encoder value is reached.

Motor 1 speed after targeted encoder value is reached. (int)

member.summary: Motor 1 change direction to counter-clockwise after targeted encoder value is reached.
